metadata.Title: CVE-2010-4209 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Flash component infrastructure in YUI 2.8.0 through 2.8.1, as used in Bugzilla 3.7.1 through 3.7.3 and 4.1, allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via vectors related to swfstore/swfstore.swf.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2010-4209` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjs-yui - 2.8.2r1~squeeze-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: loggerhead: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
webgui: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
yui package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.8.2r1~squeeze-1').
